columns.name: MED_PRBLM_LIST_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the referral record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RXFILL_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the status received from the pharmacy's RxFill message.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Dispensed


Not Dispensed


Partial Dispense


Transferred

columns.name: RXFILL_DATE
columns.description: This item stores the date when the RxFill message was generated/received.

columns.name: RXFILL_DAYS_DISP
columns.description: This item stores the number of days for which the medication was dispensed, according to the RxFill message (if the message status is Dispensed)

columns.name: RXFILL_ORDER_ID
columns.description: Stores a link to the original order for which the RxFill message was sent.

columns.name: RXFILL_MED_ID
columns.description: Stores the original medication (ERX) record for which the RxFill message was sent.

columns.name: REFERENCE_NUMBER
columns.description: Stores a reference number that uniquely identifies this dispense.

columns.name: RXFILL_PHARMACY_ID
columns.description: Stores the ID of the pharmacy that sent the RxFill message.
